range.text: In our paper, “Nested Learning: The Illusion of Deep Learning Architectures”, published at NeurIPS 2025

entries.text: In our paper, “Nested Learning: The Illusion of Deep Learning Architectures”, published at NeurIPS 2025

range.text: training process itself, specifically the backpropagation process, can be modeled as an associative memory.

entries.text: training process itself, specifically the backpropagation process, can be modeled as an associative memory.

range.text: we can order these interconnected optimization problems into "levels."

entries.text: we can order these interconnected optimization problems into "levels."

range.text: Since Nested Learning views optimizers (e.g., momentum-based optimizers) as associative memory modules, it allows us to apply principles from associative memory perspective to them.

entries.text: Since Nested Learning views optimizers (e.g., momentum-based optimizers) as associative memory modules, it allows us to apply principles from associative memory perspective to them.

range.text: ransformer, the sequence model acts as a short-term memory, holding the immediate context

range.text: The Nested Learning paradigm extends this concept into what we call a “continuum memory system” (CMS), where memory is seen as a spectrum of modules, each updating at a different, specific frequency rate.

entries.text: The Nested Learning paradigm extends this concept into what we call a “continuum memory system” (CMS), where memory is seen as a spectrum of modules, each updating at a different, specific frequency rate.

range.text: Hope: A self-modifying architecture with continuum memory

entries.text: Hope: A self-modifying architecture with continuum memory

range.text: Titans architectures are long-term memory modules that prioritize memories based on how surprising they are.

entries.text: Titans architectures are long-term memory modules that prioritize memories based on how surprising they are.

pages.title: AI向人腦又近一步！Google發布嵌套學習、賦予LLM持續學習能力 | 鉅亨網 - 美股雷達

range.text: 現有 LLM 的知識多侷限於即時輸入窗口的上下文，一旦學習新知識，就容易「遺忘」舊資訊，即所謂的「災難性遺忘」。

entries.text: 現有 LLM 的知識多侷限於即時輸入窗口的上下文，一旦學習新知識，就容易「遺忘」舊資訊，即所謂的「災難性遺忘」。

range.text: 「嵌套學習」提出，複雜的機器學習模型不應僅被視為單一的連續學習過程，而是一個由多層次、互相關聯的學習任務構成的系統

entries.text: 「嵌套學習」提出，複雜的機器學習模型不應僅被視為單一的連續學習過程，而是一個由多層次、互相關聯的學習任務構成的系統

pages.title: Day02 - 雲原生架構主流，微服務(Microservices)介紹 - iT 邦幫忙::一起幫忙解決難題，拯救 IT 人的一天

range.text: 單體式架構 (Monolithic Architecture)

entries.text: 單體式架構 (Monolithic Architecture)

range.text: 目標是將系統所需的所有元件整合到同一份程式裡，讓此應用程式不只處理單一任務，而是能負責所需的所有功能。

entries.text: 目標是將系統所需的所有元件整合到同一份程式裡，讓此應用程式不只處理單一任務，而是能負責所需的所有功能。

range.text: 易於部屬

range.text: 目標是將應用程式依據功能拆解成獨立元件，彼此透過 API 互相通訊。

entries.text: 目標是將應用程式依據功能拆解成獨立元件，彼此透過 API 互相通訊。

range.text: 拆解成獨立程式，互相使用 API 互相溝通，組合在一起即可成為完整的系統。
